name: JAN ASTHA
briefDescription: Tribes, dalits, landless and excluded groups are our primary target groups. “JAN ASTHA”has been working with Santhal, Cheros, Oraung, Kerwar, Sabar and Pandus in the States of Jharkhand. “JAN ASTHA”has been working among tribes, forest inhabitants, migrants, minor forest produce gatherers and displaced families are our priority.The other primary target group is the Dalits who comprises of Buiyans,  Mahar and Adi Dirvidars. Among them landless, agriculture laborers and migrant families are our participant groups.Within tribes and Dalits, women, children particularly working children, girl children and disabled are our focus groups. “JAN ASTHA”is also working with landless and excluded segments of poor.
